item.title: System Security Plan Model JSON Format Reference
item.description: OSCAL model OSCAL System Security Plan (SSP) Model Version 1.0.0-rc1 JSON Schema oscal_ssp_schema.json XML to JSON converter oscal_ssp_xml-to-json-converter.xsl (How do I use the converter to convert OSCAL XML to JSON?) The OSCAL Control SSP format can be used to describe the information typically specified in a system security plan, such as those defined in NIST SP 800-18. The root of the OSCAL System Security Plan (SSP) format is system-security-plan.
